meanings.definition: A type of plant from which sesame seeds are obtained.
meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested benni plants for their sesame seeds.
meanings.sent2: Sesame seeds come from the benni plant.
meanings.sent3: The benni plant whispered to the other plants, 'I have the best seeds!'
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a benni plant, yielding precious sesame seeds of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: In the field, the benni plant stood tall, proud of its valuable seeds.

meanings.definition: A small, flat, oval seed from the benni plant.
meanings.sent1: She sprinkled benni seeds on top of the bread dough.
meanings.sent2: The chef used benni seeds to add flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The benni seed rolled away from the group, trying to be a round seed.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were like scattered benni seeds, waiting to grow into something great.
meanings.sent5: The benni seed gleamed in the sunlight, promising a future plant.

meanings.sent1: Her favorite dress was a beautiful benni shade.
meanings.sent2: The walls of the house were painted in a warm benni color.
meanings.sent3: The benni color of the leaves in autumn made the forest look like a giant cinnamon roll.
meanings.sent4: The benni hue of the sunset painted the sky in a comforting warmth.
meanings.sent5: The artist mixed red and yellow to create a lovely benni tone for the painting.
